name: Firelight Occultist
text: If this card is Special Summon: you can add 1 "Firelight" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed: place this card in the Pendulum Zone. You can only use both effects of "Firelight Occultist" once per turn.
pendulum_text: You can destroy this card in the scale to Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" from your hand or face-up in the Extra Deck.
